messages.title: My priorities for Old Bexley & Sidcup

keyPolicies.policyTitle: NEW TRAINS FOR LOCAL RAIL SERVICES
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We need improved services from stations in Bexley and key to this is the introduction of a new fleet of modern, air-conditioned trains to boost capacity, reliability and passenger comfort.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: INVESTING IN OUR LOCAL HOSPITAL & NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I've been proud to champion new investment at Queen Mary's Hospital Sidcup with the opening of new cancer, kidney, dental and eye units but I want to see even more high quality health services delivered locally.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: KEEPING BEXLEY A GREAT PLACE TO LIVE & WORK
keyPolicies.policyDescription: By protecting our precious environment which makes this borough so special. It also means supporting our high streets at the heart of our community and investing in ultra fast broadband to keep us at the forefront of digital connectivity for the modern economy.

examples: We need improved services from stations in Bexley and key to this is the introduction of a new fleet of modern, air-conditioned trains to boost capacity, reliability and passenger comfort.

I've been proud to champion new investment at Queen Mary's Hospital Sidcup with the opening of new cancer, kidney, dental and eye units but I want to see even more high quality health services delivered locally.

By protecting our precious environment which makes this borough so special. It also means supporting our high streets at the heart of our community and investing in ultra fast broadband to keep us at the forefront of digital connectivity for the modern economy.
